name: Employeet not Free
description:
Does your 9-5 office job suck? You can now experience a game that sucks just as much!

Presenting Employeet not Free: The Grandest entry in the infamous Employeet saga!

FEATURES:

Intricate, deep, lore, two endings (much player agency), unique NPCs, holy shit why does this have several thousand lines of code, PROCEDURAL WORLD GENERATION (WFC algorithm), unpredictably exciting mechanics!, JPEG EVERYWHERE, chad, a metaphor about something idk I forgot what I wanted to write here. AND MORE!!! (three exclamation makrs so you know it's good)

[More features might be added in a later release without prior notice]

CONTROLS (pls read this):

WASD + Mouse to move (have you even played anything in the past idk years?)
F1 and F2 to switch windowed and fullscreen (I forgot which is which)
ESC to free your cursor, return cursor to game

DISCLAIMER: 

THIS GAME MAY NOT BE SAFE FOR PEOPLE WITH EPILEPSY OR OTHER PHOTOSENSITIVE CONDITIONS. IT IS RECOMMENDED TO PLAY AT A LOW VOLUME.
